(as of Nov 30,2022 05:11:54 UTC – Details)


FH Group got you covered! Our premium cloth car seat covers not only provide the best protection for your car’s upholstery against any type of mess but they also enhance the looks of your car’s interior. No need to worry anymore about spills, stains, mud, or anything damaging your original car seats because this car seat protector got your back. Every car seat cover we make is built with high-quality, durable materials that will protect your car’s upholstery at all times. We offer automotive seat covers in numerous fabrics, colors, and designs, so you can easily find the seat cover for cars that fits your style the most. We have car seat covers for women, for men and for everyone. Our auto seat covers are compatible with most sedans, SUVs, and vans’ front seats thanks to the universal low back seat cover design that delivers the snug fit you’re looking for, only if the front seats’ headrest is removable. Also, because safety is one of our main goals, this front set of cover for car seats is airbag compatible (officially tested!). We understand messes happen, that’s why these waterproof seat covers for cars are convenient for any type of driver. FH Group car seat covers are a great car interior accessory for your vehicle. We have it all: car seat covers for SUV, car seat covers for autos, car seat covers for vans, you name it!
[UNIVERSAL FIT] Our semi-customized car seat cover fits most vehicles better than other universal covers in the market. Our design has hook-and-loop attachments for a snug fit, straps in the bottom seat, and more, for an almost-customized look
[HIGH-QUALITY AND DURABLE MATERIALS] Our premium cloth car seat covers full set is built with 3 layers of cloth, 3mm padding and mesh fabric, making our covers a reliable and durable car seat protector.
[WASHABLE CAR SEAT COVERS] These carseat covers are machine washable! Simply remove the car seat cover, machine wash, and air dry.
[AIRBAG COMPATIBLE] Our front seat car seat covers feature a special stitching on the side allowing airbag deployment. It’s officially tested, making our covers a reliable car seat protector.
[FRONT SEAT STORAGE POCKET] The front bucket seat covers feature a handy map pocket on the back of the seat so you can store everything you need and have easy access to it.
[CUSTOMIZABLE REAR COVER] This cover is compatible with any split bench and becomes 2 individual covers with the extra mesh piece. This cover features zippers providing full access to the middle armrest. Elongate cover by adding an extra piece.
[AVAILABLE IN DIFFERENT COLORS] FH Group’s car seats come in 10 different colors, so you can perfectly match your car’s style and aesthetic.

Premium Seat Covers, Auto Accessories and More!

At FH Group we offer a wide variety of automotive products designed to make your life easier and more enjoyable.

Read more

Travel Master Series Seat Covers

Package Includes:

2 Front low back bucket covers.

1 Rear backrest cover.

1 Rear bottom bench cover.

5 Separate headrest covers.

1 Bag of snaps.

Combo packs will include additional products.

Works with Split Bench

Designed to fit 50/50, 40/60, 60/40, or 40/20/40 split rear benches

Travel Master Seat Covers

Available in several different colors. Fabric disperses heat to keep you cool and comfortable.

Premium Polyester Fabric

An eye-catching pattern adorns the center panel of this cover, adding a graceful touch to our high quality fabric.

Read more

Compatibility and Installation

Compatibility and Buying Tips

Due to installation requirement, please ensure your headrests can be detached before buying this set.This set is compatible with front side airbags and rear split function.

Dimensions

Semi-Universal to fit a wide range of cars, trucks, and SUVs.

Installation

Installation is simple with our easy instruction videos available on our website. This product is only compatible with vehicles that have detachable or adjustable headrests.

Product Features:

  • Airbag compatible – special stitching on the side allows airbag deployment. Officially tested!
  • Designed to fit 50/50, 40/60, 60/40, or 40/20/40 split rear benches
  • Semi-customized to fit most vehicles. Will not interfere with heated seats.

Read more



Unique Flat Cloth Seat Covers Complete Set For Most Sedans, SUVs, and Trucks
Highback Style Neoprene Full Set Airbag Safe
Raised Edge Multi-Use Cargo Tray For Home and Auto
FH Group Textured Grip Steering Wheel Cover
Style: Flat Cloth Pattern. Neoprene Highback. Cargo Tray. Textured Grip Steering Wheel Cover.
Feature: Our high quality fabric with 3mm of breathable foam backing is soft to the touch and disperses heat, keeping you comfortable and cool on even the hottest summer days. These neoprene seat covers are waterproof, stain proof, and life proof to protect you from all kinds of disasters. Waterproof Neoprene with Non-Slip Backing. Rear seat cover designed to accommodate 50/50, 40/60, 60/40, and 40/20/40 split benches. Our premium all-weather cargo tray will deliver the ultimate protection for your trunk. Heavy duty rubber material protects your trunk against spills and messy cargo and a specially finished surface keeps your haul from shifting around. Is your steering wheel starting to fade and wear, direct sunlight and hot temperatures can damage car interiors. The FH Group Steering Wheel Cover is designed to protect your steering wheel, while adding a touch of class to your ride.
Package Included: 2 front low back bucket covers 1 rear backrest cover 1 rear bottom bench cover 4 separate headrest covers 1 bag of snaps. 2 bucket seat covers, 1 rear bench backrest cover, 1 rear bench bottom seat cover, 3 headrest covers. 1 Raised Edge Cargo Tray for Home and Auto. 1 Steering Wheel Cover.
Dimension: Semi-Universal. Semi-Universal. Available in 32″ and 40″ Sizes. Stretchable Silicone fits all vehicles from small sedans to Trucks and SUVs.
Cleaning Tips: Wipe Clean for best results use microfiber cloth. Wipe Clean for best results use microfiber cloth. Vaccuum or use soap and water. Air dry. Wipe Clean for best results use microfiber cloth.
Installation Tips: Helpful installation videos are available after purchase. Helpful installation videos are available after purchase. Simply place wherever needed! No installation Required. Easily slides over steering wheel.

About Us

FH Group International, Inc. is a manufacturer you can depend on and trust. Our mission is to exceed your expectations by providing a large selection of outstanding car accessories at affordable prices. We are constantly striving to provide our customers with the most efficient and friendly communications, smooth transactions, and speedy deliveries.

At FH Group International, Inc., we offer a variety of car accessories such as high quality seat covers and car covers for most makes and models on the market, protective floor mats, genuine leather steering wheel covers, and much, much more.

Its original intention is to allow pet lovers to enjoy simple, convenient and cost-effective services in pet grooming. Behind the “oneisall” brand is ... Read more
item.content:encoded:
Price: $49.99 - $27.05
(as of Nov 30,2022 04:41:08 UTC – Details)

From the brand

oneisall

Founded in 2012

oneisall focus on creating products that give our pets and pet owners a better experience.

“oneisall” started with dog clippers. Its original intention is to allow pet lovers to enjoy simple, convenient and cost-effective services in pet grooming.

Behind the “oneisall” brand is the story of pet lover Peter. He found that taking dog for grooming would cost hundreds of dollars every month, and dog’s feeling was not good. Every time the clipper’s noise scared Joe. So Peter set out to design a low-noise and easy-to-use clipper.

Most popular products

Why do we love what we do?

At oneisall, our passion is pets,which drives us to produce the best possible products for our furry friends.We are borned from love for furbabys.

What makes our products unique?

We focus on making products that give our pets and pet owners a better experience. Leave the customer feedbacks in our top priority and put them into the design of products.

What’s our vision

oneisall hopes that we can bring peace of mind and quality to every pet owner, so that every pet can grow strong and healthy, and pet owners ca obtain longer and happier companionship.

Is Discontinued By Manufacturer ‏ : ‎ No
Package Dimensions ‏ : ‎ 8.62 x 7.52 x 2.44 inches; 1.23 Pounds
Item model number ‏ : ‎ 26225202-003DE
Batteries ‏ : ‎ 1 Lithium Polymer batteries required.
Manufacturer ‏ : ‎ oneisall
ASIN ‏ : ‎ B01HRSZRXM

Safe and Sharp Blade. Upgrade stainless steel fixed blade and ceramic moving blade can provide excellent cutting performance. The blade sharp enough for a long time using. Detachable blades,easy to change and clean.
Low vibration and ultra quiet design.The noise when working is only about 50 db, to help the pet feel at ease, not afraid cut hair any more.
6 guard combs(3mm/6mm/9mm/12mm/15mm/18mm). The adjustable clipping comb is applicable for clipping hair of different lengths; and the detachable guide combs make for quick, easy comb changes and increased versatility.
Please Note: if your pets get long and thick hair, you need to use scissors cut shorter at first, otherwise the clippers may jam up and don’t work properly.

Safe and Sharp Blade

Upgrade stainless steel fixed blade and ceramic moving blade can provide excellent cutting performance and long life.

Wireless and Rechargeable

Rechargeable dog clippers with built-in battery. It can be used cordless and also used when charging.

Detachable Blades

Detachable blade for ease of changing and cleaning,which offer ultimate grooming versatility.

Make Grooming Easy

Inclued a stainless steel scissor,a stainless steel comb,a oil bottle and 6 guide guards (3mm, 6mm, 9mm, 12mm,15mm and 18mm).

Read more

Product Description

PREFESSIONAL QUIET MOTOR

√ Low Noise Design

√ Lower Than 50db

√ Make It Easy For Your Pet

SHARP KNIFE

Professional Ceramic Knife Head

√ Durable

√ Sharp

√ No Fever

SUITABLE FOR BEGINNERS

√ 3 – 6- 9 – 12 mm

SUITABLE FOR BEGINNERS

√ 3 – 6- 9 – 12 mm

SUITABLE FOR BEGINNERS

Four Size Combs

√ 3 – 6- 9 – 12 mm

SUITABLE FOR BEGINNERS

Four Size Combs

√ 3 – 6- 9 – 12 mm

SOME EASY USING TIPS – 1

It’s not easy to trim the whole face. You can try to start with the dog’s eyebrows. Scissors should not be pointed at the eyes, so as not to hurt the eyes when the dog is in disorder.

SOME EASY USING TIPS – 2

Lip edges and long mandibular hair are useless and can affect the appearance. They should be cut off. When pruning, press its lips first, so as not to cause damage by sudden turbulence.

SOME EASY USING TIPS – 3

Pay attention to trimming the dog’s ear hairs. Hollowing out the inner hair of the ear can make the dog feel as comfortable as possible in the hot summer.

SOME EASY USING TIPS – 4

Trim the ear properly. If you want it to look round, don’t cut it too short around the ear roots, depending on your preferences.

Item model number ‏ : ‎ 1
Date First Available ‏ : ‎ January 30, 2007

ASIN ‏ : ‎ B07SSRDCHT

★RECHARGEABLE BATTERIES – Rechargeable clippers can make it flexible for you. It is no problem to use when charging, don’t worry, and it is safe and will not stop working.
★SAFE AND SHARP BLADE – It is suitable for the most skin-friendly grooming experience, and thanks to the precision-cut titanium blades, there’s no uncomfortable pulling at your pet’s hair.
★EASY TO USE AND ADJUSTABLE – We have 4 guard combs(3mm/6mm/9mm/12mm). The adjustable clipping comb is applicable for clipping hair of different lengths; and the detachable guide combs make for quick, easy comb changes and increased versatility.
★PAY ATTENTION – Using the scissors to cut the hair shorter first if your pet has a extremely long and thick hair cause it will make the clippers get stuck and stop working.

item.title: GHG Dog Nail Grinder Upgraded – Professional LED Lighting 3-Speed Rechargeable Pet Nail Trimmer with Clippers, Quiet Low Noise, Paws Grooming and Smoothing for Small Medium Large Dogs and Cats
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: Price: (as of – Details) Product Description GHG Dog Nail Grinder with LED Light Safe and Fast, Professional 3-speed with super strong motor GHG Pet Nail Grinder Kit is easy to grip, light weight, friendly design with a power engine and perfect for grinding all sizes of cats and dogs. Pet nail clippers help you ... Read more
item.content:encoded:
Price: $29.99 - $24.99
(as of Nov 29,2022 10:18:44 UTC – Details)

Product Description

GHG Dog Nail Grinder with LED Light

Safe and Fast, Professional 3-speed with super strong motor

GHG Pet Nail Grinder Kit is easy to grip, light weight, friendly design with a power engine and perfect for grinding all sizes of cats and dogs. Pet nail clippers help you to trim their claws . You can trim your pets nails professionally at home without any stress.

Get used to grinder

Step 1: Turn on the grinder and accustom your dog to the sound and smell, to avoid scaring your pet. Once your pets get used to it, the grinding work will be easy.

Cut the long nail

Step 2: Use the pet nail clippers to cut the sharp and too-long nails.

Apply the grinder

Step 3: Put the electric nail grinder around the 60 oblique, Put pet’s nail gently into port hole with your fingers.

Reward your pet

Step 4: After finishing grinding, reward your pet with pet snacks it will have a good memory of the nail grinder.

Appropriate Angle

The perfect time to do claw grooming work after bathing, because their nails would be softer than usual and easier to trim. 45 degrees is a perfect angle for you to smooth pet’s nails.

（Do not sharpen one nail for too long to avoid heat buildup）

Low Noise Grinder

Our pet nail grinder has powerful motor with low noise and vibration will won’t scare your dog. 3 ports and Low-Normal-High speed are enough for all sizes of pet nails and heavy grinding.

Components

Pet Nail Grinder * 1

Pet Nail Clippers * 1

USB Charging Cable * 1

User Manual * 1

Different Ports * 2

Product Dimensions ‏ : ‎ 6 x 1.3 x 1.2 inches; 13.12 Ounces
Item model number ‏ : ‎ 1
Batteries ‏ : ‎ 1 Lithium Ion batteries required.
Date First Available ‏ : ‎ January 11, 2021
Manufacturer ‏ : ‎ GHG
ASIN ‏ : ‎ B08SMD5DMD
